xwikidoc.name: InvitationLanguagePack
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for Invitation Application #---------------------------------------------------------------------- admin.invitation=Invitation Application xe.invitation.heading=Email Invitation Messenger xe.invitation.userIsReportedSpammer=A message which you sent was reported as spam and your privilege to send mail has suspended pending investigation, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.returnToMainPage=Return to the main page xe.invitation.configInfo=This document contains configuration for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.emailContainerInfo=This document contains email messages for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.emailClassInfo=This document contains the class definition for email message XObjects for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.onlyMembersCanSendMail=Sorry, only members of this wiki can send mail. xe.invitation.youAreAMemberOfOtherWiki=You seem to be a member of {0} which is a different wiki. xe.invitation.toLabel=To: xe.invitation.subjectLabel=Subject: xe.invitation.contentLabel=Message: xe.invitation.previewLabel=Preview: xe.invitation.errorWhileSending=An error has occurred while sending the message. xe.invitation.successSending=Your message has been sent.
xe.invitation.sendMail.addMessageSaveComment=Added Email Message.
xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.heading=Inspect sent message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.noMessageFound=No message by this id was found. xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.reportedAsSpam=Reported as spam xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.waitingToBeInvestigated=Waiting to be investigated xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.viewMessage=View Message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.sentBy=Sent by: xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.markThisMessageAsInvestigated=Mark this message as investigated.
xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.status=Message Status xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.viewMessagesSentByUsers=View messages sent by users xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.sender=Sender xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.subject=Subject xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.memo=Notes:
xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.sentDate=Date xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.sendingUser=Sender xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.subjectLine=Subject xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.statusCode=Status xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.memo=Memo xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.recipient=Email
xe.invitation.doAction.confirmLabel=Confirm xe.invitation.doAction.noMessageFound=No message found by that id. xe.invitation.doAction.lackingPermission=You do not have permission to do this action. xe.invitation.doAction.incorrectMessageStatus=The requested action cannot be performed on this message because it's status is {0} xe.invitation.doAction.invitationCanceledMemo={0} left you this message when canceling the invitation. xe.invitation.doAction.invalidStatus=This request cannot be processed because the status of this invitation is {0}.
xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.heading=Report Abuse xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.noMessageFound=There was no message found by the given ID. Maybe an administrator deleted the message from our system. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.success=Your report has been logged and the situation will be investigated as soon as possible, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.reportSaveComment=Reported message as spam. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.areYouSure=Are you sure you would like to report this message as abuse. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.memoLabel=Note to the administrator who investigates this report (optional)
xe.invitation.doAction.handleSpam.memoLabel=Synopsis of findings, action taken xe.invitation.doAction.handleSpam.confirmLabel=Return email privilege xe.invitation.doAction.handleSpam.reportHandledSaveComment={0} investigated spam report.
xe.invitation.doAction.accept.saveComment=Invitation accepted. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.noMessageFound=No message was found by that ID, maybe it was deleted accidentally or the system is experiencing problems. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.invitationCanceled=We're sorry but this invitation has been canceled. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyReportedAsSpam=This invitation has been reported as spam and is no longer valid. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyDeclined=This invitation has been declined and cannot be accepted now. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyAccepted=This invitation has already been accepted and the offer is no longer valid.
xe.invitation.doAction.decline.heading=Decline invitation xe.invitation.doAction.decline.memoLabel=Message to {0} (optional) xe.invitation.doAction.decline.confirmLabel=Decline invitation xe.invitation.doAction.decline.saveComment=Invitation Declined xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyReportedAsSpam=This invitation has already been reported as spam and thus cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.invitationCanceled=This invitation has been canceled and thus cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyDeclined=This invitation has already been declined and cannot be declined again. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyAccepted=This invitation has already been accepted and now cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.noMessageFound=No invitation was found by the given id. It might have been deleted or maybe the system is experiencing difficulties. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.success=This invitation has successfully been declined.
xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.heading xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.noMessageFound xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.saveComment xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.success xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.areYouSure xe.invitation.doAction.cancel.memoLabel
xe.invitation.displayMessage.anAddressesIsInvalid=One of the given email addresses is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.someAddressesAreInvalid={0} of the given email addresses are invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.theAddressIsInvalid=The email address given is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayForm.sendMail=Send Mail xe.invitation.displayForm.backToEdit=Back To Edit xe.invitation.displayForm.preview=Preview
xe.invitation.tools.heading=Tools xe.invitation.tools.myInvitationsLink=My invitations
xe.invitation.adminTools.heading=Administrative Tools xe.invitation.adminTools.configureLink=Configure the invitation application xe.invitation.adminTools.allInvitationsLink=View all invitations
xe.invitation.configuration.smtpHeading=SMTP Settings:
xe.invitation.messageStatus.unsent=Unsent xe.invitation.messageStatus.pending=Pending xe.invitation.messageStatus.accepted=Accepted xe.invitation.messageStatus.declined=Declined xe.invitation.messageStatus.canceled=Canceled xe.invitation.messageStatus.reported=Reported as spam xe.invitation.messageStatus.investigated=Spam report investigated xe.invitation.messageStatus.unknown=Unknown status
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for LiveValidation javascript validator #---------------------------------------------------------------------- platform.validation.valid=Ok. platform.validation.fieldMandatory=This Field is mandatory. platform.validation.invalidEmailAddress=Invalid email address.
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for Classes #----------------------------------------------------------------------
# XWiki.InvitationMail (Invitation Application) Email XObject XWiki.InvitationMailClass_messageID=Email message identifier XWiki.InvitationMailClass_messageGroupID=Message group identifier XWiki.InvitationMailClass_recipient=Email address which this message was sent to XWiki.InvitationMailClass_sendingUser=User who sent the message XWiki.InvitationMailClass_subjectLine=Subject line XWiki.InvitationMailClass_messageBody=Message content XWiki.InvitationMailClass_statusCode=Number indicating the message status XWiki.InvitationMailClass_memo=Memo attached to this message
# XWiki.Invitation (Invitation application) Configuration XWiki.Invitation_from_address=Admin email address (messages will list this as their from address) XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server_password=Smtp password XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server_username=Smtp username XWiki.Invitation_smtp_port=Smtp port XWiki.Invitation_smtp_server=Smtp server host name XWiki.Invitation_javamail_extra_props=Javamail extra properties XWiki.Invitation_subjectLineTemplate=Email subject line template XWiki.Invitation_messageBodyTemplate=Email message body template XWiki.Invitation_emailClass=Email message XClass XWiki.Invitation_emailContainer=Document containing email XObjects XWiki.Invitation_emailRegex=Regular expression for validating email addresses XWiki.Invitation_allowUsersOfOtherWikis=Allow users of other wikis to send mail
